runs.comm: walks down the track right away, pushes a length ball going across, towards covers
goes after another one pushed across, good length, beaten as it moves away further after pitching, gives Dhoni trouble with more movement as it approaches him
swinging into the right hander this time, Zaheer appeals for lbw, he was struck on the pad, but was also walking down the pitch, hugely optimistic
worked to midwicket
down the track again, thick edge off the length ball, in the air to third man
gone, too much walking and shuffling across in the opening over, was outside off as he swung at a length ball, missed, ball brushes pad and strikes leg stump
pushes it across the right-hander, some way outside off, left alone
swinging in from a good length, ending around middle and leg, some bounce too, drops it close to the pitch

and another one, they are walking into their dismissals, Guptill makes some room outside leg stump and outside his crease, has a big heave at a pitched up ball, it moves in past his swing, brushes the back pad and crashes into the stumps
and he is away with a serene boundary, wide length ball alright, but KW does well to put it away through a packed off side infield, past cover
punches solidly off the back foot, to covers
moves in from a length, he pushes from the crease, thick inside edge onto pad
right on off stump, holding its line from a length, zipping on, defended
swings it in, but starts it down the leg side
good length, straightening on middle and leg, nudged to midwicket
pushes at one leaving him with the angle now, squeezed down to third man
Zaheer is bowling superbly, some move in, some carry across, like this one, he drives inside the line, a sound as ball passes him, did not carry anyway, could have been bat hitting pad or ground
Yuvraj dives to stop the ball at point as KW pushes a length ball
down the pitch and across the stumps, has to defend as Zaheer drops it back of a length
dismissed through covers, enough width from Irfan again, good length, he reaches out and dispatches it gracefully
goes straighter and closer to off now, pushed wide of mid on, Balaji hits the non-striker's stumps direct, but KW is well in by then
hops and swats a back of a length ball with the inward movement in front of square leg
even more width this time, but it is hit hard on the bounce to Tiwary at cover, he leaps to take it
straightening close to off, tentatively pushed down to mid on
looked a decent shout for lbw, good length ball straightening on the stumps, could have been height, could have been headed down leg, need to wait for replays
flicked over square leg, comes charging down the track, back leg in the air as he picks it up from outside off
good length on off, he came forward, tapped it in front of cover and ran immediately, well-judged run
pushes at one leaving him with the angle, thick edge down to third man
flicked again extravagantly past the man at square leg, fine leg gets around to it
width, and he does not let it go waste, waits with feet wide apart, and carves it past point
length ball angled in, on off, he pushes in the air off the front foot and takes the run to mid off
holds its line right away, angled in on a length outside off, defended towards point
angled in to middle and leg from wide of the crease, blocked
bowling it into the stumps once again, gets bat in front of pad to defend towards mid on
gives him the charge, has a go at the pitched up ball, which hits the inside edge and flies down leg past the stumps
the slower one arrives from Balaji, he bowls it so much in the IPL, way too wide though, slapped straight to covers
as wide as the previous one, much fuller, this time he attacks it, and slices it high over point, no chance for third man
loopy full one lofted gently over extra cover
hurries in with the angle, defended off a thick inside edge
beats him on the cut, with a quicker one outside off
comes down the pitch and mistimes the heave along the ground to long on
straightens outside off, staying a bit low, slapped away to sweeper cover
length ball outside off, forced down to wide long off
good length ball pushed through down the leg side
full delivery pushed down to long on with the spin
tossed up offbreak spin in, defended off the front foot
straight length ball outside off now, slapped wide of sweeper cover
charges out, does not quite get hold of one outside off, drags it along the ground to long on
gets the last ball of the over away for four, skips out and powers it over extra cover, too much pace on it for long off
pulls a shortish one to deep midwicket
skips out, takes it on the full and mows it straight down the ground
quicker one bouncing outside off, he stays in the crease and cuts hard, Virat at point dives at the ball, it falls in front of him, brushes his hand and races to sweeper cover
stuck his left hand out in the path of a powerful swing, technically a chance, captain applauds at Yuvraj's effort, probably for saving the boundary
short, fired in flat, into the pads, nudged to midwicket
fullish on middle and leg, swept down to fine leg
takes it on the half volley and eases it to long on

hit on the pad, that looked very close, pitched very full, spun in a bit under the attempted reverse sweep, hit him in front of off, if there was no inside edge that was plumb, umpire gives it as runs, did not look to be an inside edge
down the track after that appeal, and lifts him over wide long on
worked behind square leg
McCullum gives him the charge and launches him over extra cover, that's his fifty as well
Dhoni comes up to the stumps, fullish on the off stump and he pushes it back to the bowler
crisp drive straight down the ground, sound timing there, the fielder at long-on mops up
good length outside the off stump and he punches it to deep point
slower ball outside the off stump and he punches it to sweeper cover
punches it with soft hands in front of cover and he sets off for a quick single
Kohli gives him a lot of width outside off, he reaches out and cuts to sweeper cover
tries to cut but he's beaten, kept a bit low maybe
fetches that from middle, gets on his knee and mows it over midwicket, Tiwary dives and fumbles in front of the rope
mows him across the line to midwicket
touch short and he bends and pulls behind square
slower delivery and he he chips it in the air down to long-off
sweeps the seamer, audacious and he fetches a four to fine leg, picked that gap very easily, was down on his knee early for that fuller ball
switches to over the wicket this time, slower ball and he pushes it towards point and the fielder doesn't pick it cleanly

Ashwin judges it well running backwards, Williamson moved a long way across the stumps to fetch that one, tries to scoop it down to fine leg, he skies it and Ashwin runs backwards from short fine leg and takes it well, these catches are quite tricky
comes round the wicket and he fires it full, he jams it out to mid-off
good length on the off stump and he opens the face and steers it to third man
tucks him up for room, makes a bit of room and punches it to cover
goes back and punches it to the off side
drops it short and he uses the crease and pulls in front of square
gets across his stumps and works it across the line to deep midwicket
good length outside off and punched wide of cover point
fuller delivery and he gets forward and drives him down to long-off
another fuller ball driven down to long-off, tight over from Kohli
just drops short of Kohli at long-on! He makes room and comes down the track, it was flat and quick and Kohli dived and saved a boundary
goes for the slog and he mistimes it, the ball rolls behind the keeper
comes down the track and he scoops a full toss over extra cover, just beats the sweeper at the boundary
comes down the track and pounds it down to long-off
slides it down the leg side
tries to loft over long-on but doesn't time it well, safe enough
McCullum is really targeting Ashwin here, down the track and he smashes a full toss down to long-on, poor over from Ashwin, two full tosses dispatched
drags it across the line down to deep midwicket
makes room and drives him forcefully towards sweeper cover
similar shot, on his knee and driven squarer this time, the fielder at deep cover had to run across
pushes it towards cover
confusion at the boundary there, he mows it down to deep midwicket and two fielders converged, the placement was too good and the fielders (Tiwary was one of them) gave up
goes the other way this time, makes room and scoops it over extra cover, the ball beats the boundary riders
excellent shot, comes round the wicket and it's a length ball on middle, lofts through the line and clears long-on
pushes it down to long-off for a single
comes over the wicket this time, slower ball outside off, McCullum made a lot of room and had to stretch to reach that one, enough on it to beat cover

falls 9 short of his century! Irfan can't believe he has got him with that delivery, it was the slower ball from the back of the hand, landed outside the leg stump and McCullum was on his knee to slog, came on much slower than expected and he swished at it too early, hits his arm and then onto the stumps
dabs a short ball down to third man
another slower delivery from the back of the hand, the batsman comes forward and nearly yorks himself, pushed to the off side for a quick single
slower ball outside off and he pushes it on the full to long-off
it's that man Yuvraj who takes the catch! Franklin was foxed by the slower ball, he wants to loft him but gets a top edge that swirls towards cover point where Yuvraj takes it
slower ball on the pads and he works it down to short fine leg
gets behind the line and tucks it to the on side
slower ball and he drags it down to long-on
risky run, slower ball bowled real full and he gets his bat down and squeezes it out, Balaji runs forward, picks up and throws to the bowler's end because Oram was struggling a bit, misses
slower ball and he drops it a bit short, he swivels and clubs it down to deep miwicket
follows it up with a precise yorker, makes room and he fires it down the leg side, Oram cannot squirt it out
fortune for Oram this time, another yorker outside leg and he goes for the slog and gets an inside edge down to fine leg for four
another yorker closer to the stumps and he makes room and squirts it to the off side
follows it up with a better yorker, cramps him up for room and Taylor can only squirt it back to the bowler
fuller ball on the pads and he clips it down to deep midwicket
slower ball and shorter and he swivels and clubs it down to deep square leg
slower ball and he stays at the crease and swings with one hand, in the air for a while and it drops short of long-on
Oram makes a lot of room to a length delivery wide of the off stump and he carves that over short third man
slower ball on and he swings across the line to deep square leg, just the single though
the slower ball becomes a high full toss outside off and he miscues it over cover, close to being a no-ball for height
swings a length delivery over square leg but can't beat the fielder in the deep, will just be a single
